snippet: Lucas Duda has displayed equal measures of prodigious power and youthful insecurity during his 129 games as a major leaguer with the Mets.
abstract: New York Mets outfielder Lucas Duda, at 6-foot-4, 255-pounds, has displayed equal measures of prodigious power and youthful insecurity during his 129 major league games; he might not be ready to be an everyday slugger in the middle of the lineup, and he may be overmatched defensively in right field, but the Mets have few other choices as they begin the 2012 season.
lead_paragraph: Lucas Duda has displayed equal measures of prodigious power and youthful insecurity during his 129 games as a major leaguer with the Mets.

headline.seo: Mets’ Lucas Duda Is Coming, Ready or Not
headline.main: Ready or Not, Here Comes Duda
headline.print_headline: Ready or Not, Here Comes Duda
